vikhost.com strives to provide quality web hosting services at affordable rates. We love what we do and always try to provide bests for peoples who trusted us. We are here 24/7/365 to assist you with any hosting questions. Allow us the opportunity to exceed your expectations!!!

We offer VPS with next specs:

vCPU: 1 core
RAM: 1 Gb
HDD (SSD): 10 Gb
IP addreses: 1 x IPv4
Access: Root
10$/month

Promo code: VPS10$

If you need trial period, please contact us and we will provide it for you.

Payment Methods: Visa/MC, Bitcoin, Litecoin, Bitcoin Gold/Cash etc.

- Without contract
- Services with monthly billing period
- 24/7 customer support
- Network connection 1 Gbps
- Free setup
